description:
reddit: the voice of the internet -- news before it happens

Most recent changes:

- Browse galleries with slideshow support
- Save gallery pictures as your wallpaper
- Dashboard notifications for new messages and karma changes
- Easily see both articles and comments on the Touchpad frontpage
- Launch and Search through Just Type

Join one of the largest online communities, or you know, just lurk anonymously, and browse user submissions and comments that range from the mundane to the hilarious, and cover just about every topic out there. Whether you're into news, humor, photography or something more obscure, you'll probably find it (first) on reddit.

IAmA reddit allows you to register a user, login, browse topics by category, search, upvote and downvote user comments, reply to comments and more.

More features are planned!
